500.description: An unknown error occurred in the server. It is confirmed that your latest request has failed.
solution: If the error persists, contact the maintainer of this site

409.description: Your request could not be processed because an existing resource already exists.

400.description: Your request could not be processed because the input received does not satisfy criteria
400.solution: Change your request to meet the requirement and re-submit

401.description: Your credentials could not be validated therefore your identity was not authenticated

422.description: Your request could not be processed because your input data is invalid.
solution: Check your query params if GET and form entries if POST
If the error persists, contact the maintainer of this site

405.description: The server could not process your request because an unsupported method was used.
solution: If the error persists, contact the maintainer of this site
